articles.title: Wonder Woman 1984 review – the superheroine 2020 needs - The Guardian
articles.description: Gal Gadot’s warrior queen strikes just the right tone of hope and dynamism in Patty Jenkins’s stylish, empowering sequel
articles.content: This long-delayed sequel to 2017s hugely enjoyable superhero romp Wonder Woman was originally slated for release lastChristmas, but it may be just the tonic we need right now. Combining the colourful… [+3404 chars]
